name: Tie a tassel necklace kit
description:
Make your own tassel necklace kit. Choose your favourite Sublime Floss colour and do it yourself.  Make one just for you or they will certainly make a great gift for your friends!

Kit comes with instructions, silver necklace and embroidery floss of your choice.

name: Hot Air Balloon embroidery kit
description:
Introducing my very own embroidery design! This whimsical little embroidery pattern is not only quick and easy to make - it is cute too! Three different balloons floating away with tea cups and saucers for baskets. How adorable!

Kit includes preprinted cotton, floss, needle and complete instructions to complete your little stitchery.

Finished design size approximately 4 inches.

name: Tie a tassel keychain kit
description:
Make your own tassel keychain. Choose your favourite Sublime Floss colour and do it yourself. Hang one from your bag or hang one from your keys. They will look great wherever you find a spare spot that needs a little fun.

Kit comes with instructions, key chain and embroidery floss of your choice.

name: Friendship Bracelet kit
description:
Friendship bracelets are so fun to make! They can be made in any colour combination you choose from embroidery floss. These instructions will help you to master the left and right knot and create your very own bracelets for yourself and your friends.

Kit includes instructions for stripe and chevron styles, floss set and a pin.

name: SUBLIME FLOSS embroidery thread
description:
This floss is the boss!

Grab and go with our exclusive line of Sublime Floss color packs! Every palette has seven, 8.75 yd (8m) skeins of the finest quality, 100% cotton, six-stranded floss. Smooth, shiny and colourfast!

Each palette tells a story and every color is a character.

Colors not sold individually at this time.

name: HIDE AND SEEK WITH FOXY embroidery kit
description:
Hide and Seek by Holly Wolfe 
Kit includes pre-printed linen, embroidery floss, design sheet, and instructions.

Foxy! Foxy!
I tried and tried to follow, I've looked up and down and all around through forest, bough and hollow hide and seek is foxy's favourite game, he is the best at hiding. He used to hide from me too before I told him I'm not really related to the big bad wolf. Then he became my best friend! Put this over a canvas, or you can use the stitchery however you want!

Completed embroidery size: 6 1/4 x 7 1/2 inches

name: SLEEPOVER bag pattern
description:
SLEEPOVER 
Melly and Me by Melanie Hurlston 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Make your next sleepover or weekend away a lot more fun with this great overnight bag. Create a combination to match your personality and this bag will fit all that you could need on that next adventure. Why not make one out of plastic coated or upholstery weight fabric to give some extra strength? And don't forget to scotch guard!

Completed size: 21 x 21 inches including handles

name: Seasons quilt pattern kits
description:
*DESTASH SALE SPECIAL*
Seasons by Acorn Quilt and Gift Company

This popular 6 part pattern was previously offered as a block of the month program. It is the perfect all year round!

In this kit you get all 6 patterns along with all the fabric you need to complete the appliqué. All you need to provide is your white and blue background. Original value over $150!

name: My Sweet Friend Embroidery Pattern
description:
Hide and Seek by Holly Wolfe 
Pattern includes iron on transfer, design sheet and instructions.

These adorable friends are posing for a photo in my imagination, a happy pair frozen in time! This would make a lovely image to grace the wall of any room. However you can use it in any way you like, that’s what a happy stitch is all about!

Completed embroidery size: 11 x 6 1/2 inches

name: Hoop Faces embroidery pattern
description:
Hoop Faces by Matching Pegs
Pattern includes 

One simple stitch + 12 fun designs = one fantastic stitching party!
Have a sewing party or just teach your child to stitch. Children as young as 6 can have a go! Details about making "Gingerbread Buttons" included.

Completed embroidery sizes: 4 x 4 inches

name: TAIL FEATHERS block of the month quilt (pattern only)
description:
**Pattern only available on request! Contact me today!**

TAIL FEATHERS... A Feathered Journey 10 part series.
Cinderberry Stitches by Natalie Lymer. 

Each of the 10 packs contains a full size pattern, transfers and instructions. You can use 2 'honey bun' rolls (1 ½ inch strips) plus borders, binding and backing to complete the kit

Approximate completed size: 61 inches (155cm) square.

>COMPLETE SET: $135 + postage

>MONTHLY SUBSCRIPTION: $15 per month + postage
Terms and conditions:
-To purchase the patterns monthly over 10 months, please proceed to the checkout as normal.
-Your remaining patterns will be sent on the first  Monday of the month.
-By choosing to purchase monthly you agree to pay the amount monthly for the number of months in the complete set. 
-Your PayPal account or credit card will be reminded for payment, and you prompt attention is most appreciated!
-Total payment minimum is $150.00 plus postage.

name: Madame Sausage soft toy pattern
description:
Madame Sausage by Ric Rac
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Madame Sausage loves nothing more than packing her suitcase and heading off on an adventure!

Completed size: 15 inches tall

name: Spacewalk quilt pattern
description:
Spacewalk by Matching Pegs
Pattern includes easy instructions on how to customise the flag with your child's name

The ideal gift for the stargazing enthusiast in your life. A quilt that will still be suitable when your younger child grows. Use up some of your stash to make this beautiful boys space quilt with easy piecing and appliqué. 

Finished size: 40 x 55 inches

name: Florrie and Finn Fox soft toy pattern
description:
Florrie and Finn by Two Brown Birds
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Florrie and Finn are the best of friends. They love to spend their days wandering through the forrest. The pattern for this foxy little couple is quick and suitable for a beginner.

Completed size: 11 1/2 x 7 1/2 inches

name: Mini Magoo soft toy pattern
description:
Mini Magoos by Melly and Me
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Based on the ever popular Magoo, meet Max and MimiM These monkeys are the perfect size to become children of your own Magoo or are an easy to handle version for smaller babies and toddlers. They feature super cute overalls and dress. 

Finished size: 16 inches tall

name: Best ever snippy scissors
description:
These snippy scissors are the best ever. Super sharp and super cute. Each pair comes with a stylish leather sheath to protect your snips.

Your threads will thank you for having these best ever snippy scissors on hand!

name: needle pack and magnet
description:
Here are my favorite needles for everyday embroidering. Available especially for Sublime Stitchers. It's not too big, not too small, sharp and sensibly sized. The eye is big enough to thread with embroidery floss and easily stitch through most fabrics. These are the same needles I use for nearly every project! (This needle pack is included in the Ultimate Embroidery Kit.)

Each pack includes 4 needles  and Sublime Stitching illustrated magnet (shown)

name: Woven Labels
description:
Pack includes 4 satiny woven labels.

Attach to your hand-stitched or hand-sewn projects (can be folded in half and inserted along the seam, or applied flat) and voilà! Haute couture. Well, almost. Ends are heat-sealed so they won't fray!

Four, pre-cut, sew-in labels. 
Each label measures 3 inches long x 6/8 inches wide.

name: Snorkel soft toy rattle mini pattern
description:
Snorkel by Simone Gooding for May Blossom
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Cute little elephant rattle, perfect for little hands. Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A5 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size: 7 inches long

name: Dimple Dumpling Dolls soft toy mini pattern
description:
Dimple Dumpling by Simone Gooding for May Blossom
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Another gorgeous pattern from Simone - can be used as ornaments for your Christmas tree, or as a perfect quick gift for that special someone. Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A5 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size: 4 inches long

name: Louie Super Monkey soft toy pattern
description:
Louie Super Monkey by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Louie is the cheekiest little super-monkey in the neighbourhood.  Always the first to try new things, Louie is the monkey with the tallest stories, the biggest adventures and the grazed knees.

Completed size: 18 inches tall

name: Craft Clock soft toy pattern
description:
Craft Clock by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

The perfect gift for any crafter in your life; More time to craft as the plush craft clock features a 32 hours day! Embroider the hands wherever you like or follow the pattern and never run out of time for crafting.

Completed size: 8 inches

name: Zip-It girl's dress pattern
description:
Make It Perfect by Toni Coward 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Zip-It is a comfortable, easy to wear dress with loads of retro-style, featuring a chunky, bright coloured zipper down the front, it not only boasts funky style, it is also super easy to put on and off.

With contrast circular yoke and stand-out curved pockets, Zip-It is a bright, sunshiny dress boasting pure fun. 

Don’t be intimidated by the zipper – this is the easiest way of inserting a zipper you can try, perfect for a beginner! 

Zip-It looks equally great on it’s own or with leggings and layers on chilly days – a timeless dress for every occasion!

Includes sizes 0 (6-12 months), 1 - 5

name: Little Stomp soft toy mini pattern
description:
Little Stomp by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Fun little rhinos to make for your kids. Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A4 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size: 3 1/2 inches high

name: Hedgehog Circus soft toy mini pattern
description:
Hedgehog Circus by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

This cute little felt hedgehog softies are sure to be a favourite with kids and kids at heart! Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A4 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size: 4 inches

name: Rag Rug mini pattern
description:
Rag Rug by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Rag Rug will had a splash of colour to the floor of any room - or, alternatively, why not try draping it over a couch for a gorgeous cover?Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A4 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size is up to you!

name: Ulrich Little Heart soft toy mini pattern
description:
Ulrich Little Heart  by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Ulrich Little Heart makes the perfect softie gift for any little boy.  These Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A4 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size: 6 1/2 inches

name: Owl Post soft toy mini pattern
description:
Owl Post by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

Have a blast making our fun little Postie Owl out of felt. Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A4 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!

Completed size: 4 x 4 inches

name: Pin Whale soft toy mini pattern
description:
Pin Whale by Jodie Carleton for Ric Rac 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions.

This adorable pin-cushion is excellent value and easy to make out of felt. Creative Cards are fun, compact mini-patterns.  They come as a single folded A4 card and contain all the step-by-step instructions and templates needed to make fast and easy patterns perfect for people with little pockets of time to create!
Completed size: 6 1/2 inches

name: Forest Friends embroidery patterns
description:
Jenny Hart for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

The snow is melting and our forest friends are coming out to play! Don't stare at that hedgehog too long, or you may be blinded by cuteness. Included on this sheet is an oversized pattern of a stag head, perfect for putting on the back of a jacket. Spring is here everyone!

name: epic alphabet embroidery pattern
description:
Jenny Hart for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

House Industries are masters of type. Here's a mixed alphabet of their fantastic typefaces to create an epic alphabet embellished by us with embroidery stitches. Use this lively lettering to stitch monograms, dancing words, and swirly sayings. Or, transfer the entire sheet at once for a sampler!

name: tattoo your towels embroidery pattern
description:
Julie West for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

Here they are! The perfect marriage of needle arts. What else is there to say? Vintage tattoo flash embroidery patterns. Righteous.

name: craftopia embroidery pattern
description:
Julie West for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

Are you crafty and proud? Is a sewing room heaven to you? Adorn your workspace, your knitting bag, your work apron - everything - with emblems of your many talents.

name: Julie West embroidery pattern
description:
Julie West for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

Artist and illustrator Julie West has a truly unique style all her own. Her line work makes for some modern and edgy embroidery patterns you won't find anywhere else (I especially love her robot-meets-Russian-doll look). Sweet and otherworldly all at once!

name: fantasy flowers embroidery pattern
description:
Jenny Hart for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

Shh! I'm trying to lure in the more traditional needleworkers. Flowers are an embroidery must. I just think they could be more...fantastical than fuddy-duddy.

name: darling dachshunds embroidery pattern
description:
Jenny Hart for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

More precious than poodles, all hail the darling Dachshund. Comes with a hatbox, hot dog (what else?) and curvy gal on a walk.

name: The Black Apple embroidery pattern
description:
Emily Martin for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

I am so very excited to introduce Emily Martin's (aka The Black Apple) drawings as embroidery transfers for you! Her tiny houses and proper little children have a sweet but mysteriously dark side lurking. Welcome to her world.

name: Spaced Out embroidery pattern
description:
Jenny Hart for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

First embroidery patterns in space! Blast off with a raygun totin' rocket girl and atomic doodads. Simply stellar designs!

name: Gnomes and Fairies embroidery pattern
description:
Jenny Hart for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

Remember when you closed your eyes and wished real hard that there were gnome and fairy patterns? Well, you can open your eyes now, because here they are! Do gnomes get crushes on fairies? I think they do...

name: Kurt Halsey embroidery pattern
description:
Kurt Halsey for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

The only thing that could possibly make Kurt Halsey's twee and sad illustrations any sweeter, is to embroider them. His simple but touching illustrations are perfect for embroidery! Stitch up messages of love between smitten angels, birds and bees.

name: Erin Paisley animal embroidery patterns
description:
Erin Paisley for Sublime Stitching 
Pack includes transfer sheet and embroidery instructions.

Erin Paisley makes dreamy, wistful watercolors of animals, windswept girls and fantasy floral motifs. She's also an embroiderer, and has been on my crush list for several years. Her work is uniquely identifiable and she makes the simplest motifs all her own. You can embroider these sweet animals to fit inside an 8" hoop for a sweet wall arrangement.

name: FEED THE BIRDIES embroidery kit
description:
Feed the Birdies by Holly Wolfe 
Kit includes pre-printed linen, embroidery floss, design sheet, and instructions.

These birdies never seem to want to share my lunch with me for some reason, that's okay though, because they are still fun to sew with (so quiet!). You can stretch the stitchery over a canvas, in an embroidery hoop or whatever you wish with the final piece, as long as your project can accomodate the size that Holly created it to be!

Completed embroidery size: 6 3/4 x 10 inches

name: BOY AND BIRD embroidery kit
description:
Boy and Bird by Holly Wolfe
Kit includes pre-printed linen, embroidery floss, design sheet, and instructions.

Do you want to go for a walk with Birdie and I today? He is horribly large, but boy loves him just as he is! Let's begin a stitching journey and bring these friends to life. You can stretch this over a canvas, or apply it to a plain canvas bag you want to spice up. If you feel creative anything is possible! (Well, maybe not untangling the thread foxy got into, but that is another story).

Completed embroidery size: 6 1/4 x 7 1/2 inches

name: WHERE THE WIND SINGS embroidery kit
description:
Where the Wind Sings by Holly Wolfe 
Kit includes pre-printed linen, embroidery floss, design sheet, and instructions.

The wind can be a spooky sounding thing, but when I think of the wind, I am taken to a grassy hillside. This stitchery is a snippet of the strong moments and memories we all have. You can stretch the stitchery over a canvas, but I would love to see this in someone's home on a cushion, bag or quilt in a place of quiet reflection.

Completed embroidery size: 5 1/4 x 8 inches

name: PICKLE MOUSE felt soft toy pattern
description:
PICKLE MOUSE
May Blossom by Simone Gooding
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

May Blossom is a new designer to the store, and what cute felt creations she makes! Jill Barklem's Brambly Hedge mice are the inspiration, a set of three twitchy nosed little mice! They would be so cute in a babies room or maybe on display where everyone who comes in can go a bit gaga over them.

Completed size: 6 inches high

name: MAGOO the monkey soft toy pattern
description:
MAGOO
Melly and Me by Melanie Hurlston 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

This cheeky monkey, Magoo just loves to hang around and charm anyone who passes! Why not make a dress and change him into a girl monkey for a special girl!

Completed size: 23 inches (57cm) tall

name: SLUMBER PARTY JAMMIES children's pyjama pattern
description:
SLUMBER PARTY JAMMIES
Make it perfect by Toni Coward

*DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND, THE SLUMBER PARTY JAMMIES PATTERN NOW COMES IN LARGER SIZES!*

Send the kids to bed in style with a pair of funky, cool slumber party jammies! With a comfy elastic waistband and fun drawstring tie, they will be guaranteed a good nights sleep, When sewing slumber party jammies as a gift, the matching drawstring bag makes a great gift bag which can be later used to hang on the end of the bed as a neat place to keep their jammies when they aren't being worn!

name: SWEET DREAMS adult pyjama pants pattern
description:
Sweet Dreams by Make it Perfect.
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

There is nothing better than popping on a pair of PJs at the end of a long day.  Sweet Dreams pyjama pants are super comfy - ticking all the boxes with wide legs, a beautiful stain ribbon drawstring and cool contrasting trim.  Team them up with the stylish cosmetics purse - featuring a cute bubble shape and handy wrist strap, it is big enough for all the necessities!

Includes adults sizes x-small, small, medium, large and x-large.

name: GIDDY-UP hobby horse pattern
description:
GIDDY-UP!
Melly and Me by Melanie Hurlston
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

One of the fondest memories growing up is that of an old fashioned hobby horse. Perfect for spending hours role playing riding a horse! Make and personalise this hobby horse for all little boys and girls in your life. This pattern is recommended for a 4-6 year old, if your child is younger; reduce the stick length to make it more usable. If you have somebody handy in the house, why not add wheels to the base of the stick?

Completed size: approximately 36 inches long.

name: RED AND LITTLE WOLF by May Blossom
description:
RED AND LITTLE WOLF
May Blossom by Simone Gooding 
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Simone just keeps on coming up with these fantastic designs. This one has such a widespread appeal. Red Riding Hood and Wolf dolls made from Linen, Fabric and Felt.

Completed size: 14 inches high

name: UPTOWN GIRL children's jacket pattern
description:
UPTOWN GIRL
Make It Perfect by Toni Coward
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

*DUE TO POPULAR DEMAND, THE UPTOWN GIRL PATTERN NOW COMES IN LARGER SIZES!*

The Uptown Girl jacket will keep your little girl warm and cosy, whilst still looking absolutely stunning during the cooler weather. The jacket is completely reversible, ensuring maximum wear and versatility. Soft gentle gathers on both the front and back of the jacket add a feminine touch without being too fussy or frilly. This jacket is destined to cuddle your little girl with stylish flair! 

Little Uptown Girl includes sizes 6 months-5 years
Big Uptown Girl includes sizes 6-10 years

name: LEON the lion soft toy pattern
description:
LEON
Melly and Me Pattern by Rosalie Quinlan
Package includes pattern and complete instructions

Melly and Me’s latest addition to their soft toy family. Leon is a cute little lion, perfect for cuddling at any time. He is brave and  true and a good friend to all. He is wearing cute little shorts with braces and is the bravest softie of them all!

Completed size  22 inches (56cm) tall
